items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.

items.content_html: On this repo , I have a scalable, lightning-fast Node.js backend. Perfect for real-time processing and handling high volumes of traffic with efficiency. Built to be lightweight yet robust, this repo ensures rides are accepted, tracked, and completed without a hitch. ‚ö°

Perfect for real-time processing and handling high volumes of traffic with efficiency. Built to be lightweight yet robust, this repo ensures rides are accepted, tracked, and completed without a hitch. ‚ö°

items.content_html: A simple back-end notes application built with Hapi.js. This project provides a RESTful API for managing notes (create, read, update, delete) stored in memory. Developed as part of a Dicoding assignment, it's a lightweight solution ideal for learning and small-scale projects.
items.title: kazuddd/notes-api-backend: A simple back-end notes application built with Hapi.js. This project provides a RESTful API for managing notes (create, read, update, delete) stored in memory. Developed as part of a Dicoding assignment, it's a lightweight solution ideal for learning and small-scale projects.
